description:
An Open Source Physical Layer for the DARPA Spectrum Collaboration Challenge.

This repo contains the source code of the physical layer developed for the DARPA Spectrum Collaboration Challenge (SC2).

This repo contains the source code of the physical layer developed for the DARPA Spectrum Collaboration Challenge (SC2). SCATTER PHY is described in the paper below.
